Rpv_mass
========

.. table:: Algorithm
   :widths: 15 15 15

   +------------------------+-----------------------------------+-----------------------------------------+
   | **Algorithm Name**     | **What is this algorithm for?**   | **Description**                         |
   +========================+===================================+=========================================+
   | rpv_mass               | Variables                         | Total mass of the RPV (tons)            |
   +------------------------+-----------------------------------+-----------------------------------------+
